content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case that lasted for 7 years the court of bari ruled in favor of delspa mf and others declaring the dissolution of a community property specifically an apartment located in monopoli however the court rejected the application for division regarding a garage in the same location the court approved and declared a division project ordering the payment of shares indicated in the approved project certain expenses were cancelled and mf was ordered to reimburse court costs the court considered arguments and evidence from various parties involved in the case including delspa mf pm ps and several bankruptcy trustees the costs of the litigation were settled between the plaintiff and defendant based on the principle of succumb overall the court made a final ruling on the claim resolving the issues related to the community property and ordering the reimbursement of costs to certain parties involved
